name: Authorization Information
description: The AUI data type is used to represent authorization and approval information for healthcare services, procedures, and treatments. It contains details about insurance pre-authorizations, medical necessity approvals, and administrative authorizations required for patient care. AUI enables healthcare systems to track authorization status, approval numbers, and authorization validity periods, ensuring compliance with insurance requirements and regulatory guidelines.

AUI.1.name: Authorization Number
AUI.1.description: The unique authorization or approval number assigned by the authorizing entity. This identifier is used to reference the specific authorization in communications and claims.

AUI.2.name: Date
AUI.2.description: The date when the authorization was granted or becomes effective. Establishes the temporal validity of the authorization.

AUI.3.name: Source
AUI.3.description: The entity or organization that granted the authorization (e.g., insurance company, medical director, utilization review organization). Identifies the authorizing authority.

constraints.authorizationNumber: Authorization number should be unique within the authorizing source's system
constraints.dateValidation: Date should be valid timestamp format indicating authorization timing
constraints.sourceIdentification: Source should clearly identify the authorizing entity or system
